scripts.start: cross-env APP_BACKEND_URL=https://omnimap.ru LLM_GATEWAY_URL=http://0.0.0.0:7998  SINC_SERVICE_URL=wss://omnimap.ru/ws/ws webpack serve --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.start_local: cross-env APP_BACKEND_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8000/ LLM_GATEWAY_URL=http://0.0.0.0:7998  SINC_SERVICE_URL=ws://0.0.0.0:7999/ws webpack serve --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.build: cross-env APP_BACKEND_URL=https://omnimap.ru LLM_GATEWAY_URL=http://0.0.0.0:7998  SINC_SERVICE_URL=wss://omnimap.ru/ws webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.build:debug: cross-env APP_BACKEND_URL=https://omnimap.ru LLM_GATEWAY_URL=http://0.0.0.0:7998  SINC_SERVICE_URL=wss://omnimap.ru/ws webpack --config webpack.debug.js
